00084 class DZ_EXPORT IDzTextInputFile
00085 {

00103 
00104 // Adapts the concrete class to the interface through delegation.
00105 // Owns the DzTextInputFile passed into its c'tor.
00106 // Do not give it pointers to objects on the stack.
00107 class DZ_EXPORT DzTextInputFileAdapter : public IDzTextInputFile
00108 {
00109 public:
00110     DzTextInputFileAdapter(DzTextInputFile *inputFile)
00111         : m_inputFile(inputFile)
00112     {
00113     }
00114 
00115     virtual ~DzTextInputFileAdapter()
00116     {
00117         delete m_inputFile;
00118         m_inputFile = 0;
00119     }
00120 
00121     virtual bool    open() { return m_inputFile->open(); }
00122     virtual void    close() { m_inputFile->close(); }
00123     virtual void    setStripQuotes(bool strip) { m_inputFile->setStripQuotes(strip); }
00124     virtual bool    getLine(char **tokens, int &nTokens) { return m_inputFile->getLine(tokens, nTokens); }
00125     virtual bool    atEnd() const { return m_inputFile->atEnd(); }
00126     virtual bool    stripQuotes() { return m_inputFile->stripQuotes(); }
00127     virtual int     size() const { return m_inputFile->size(); }
00128     virtual QString name() const { return m_inputFile->name(); }
00129 
00130 private:
00131     DzTextInputFile*    m_inputFile;
00132 };
